utils

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains arbitrary helper methods used by Calendar functionalities

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean deleteDirectory(java.io.File directory)
      This method recursively deletes all contents of the passed directory on the file system.
      static java.lang.String stringToURI(java.lang.String s)
      This method converts a String to an encoded data-URL with the String's content being the resource.
      static java.lang.String uriToString(java.lang.String uri)
      This method decodes a String from a data-URL encoded with stringToURI(String).

    • Method Detail

      • stringToURI

        public static java.lang.String stringToURI(java.lang.String s)
        This method converts a String to an encoded data-URL with the String's content being the resource.
        Parameters:
        s - the String encoded to a data-URL
        Returns:
        the String representing the URL containing the content of s

      • uriToString

        public static java.lang.String uriToString(java.lang.String uri)
        This method decodes a String from a data-URL encoded with stringToURI(String).
        Parameters:
        uri - the String representing the data-URL containing the String
        Returns:
        the String that was decoded

      • deleteDirectory

        public static boolean deleteDirectory(java.io.File directory)
        This method recursively deletes all contents of the passed directory on the file system.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory that will be deleted
        Returns:
        true if the directory was successfully deleted, false otherwise
